composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: Repeat this steps [1 to 7] then for all floors. Once all done click on "Done"

composition.layer: Repita estos pasos [1 a 7] para todos los pisos. Una vez realizado todo el proceso, haga clic en "Hecho"

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: If the commissioned floor is successful then the Blue tooth Icon in the App turns to Green.

composition.layer: Si la puesta en marcha en el piso seleccionado es correcta, el icono Bluetooth de la aplicación se vuelve verde.

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: If it is correct, Continue with the Confirm Button.

composition.layer: Si es correcto, continúe con el botón Confirmar.

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: Check if the floor and side is correct.

composition.layer: Compruebe que el piso y el embarque sean correctos.

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: Once the BLE beacon has been discovered it can be selected and click to "Assign" 2

composition.layer: Una vez detectada la baliza BLE ésta se puede seleccionar y hacer clic en "Asignar"

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: Once the BLE beacon has been discovered it can be selected and click to "Assign"

composition.layer: Una vez detectada la baliza BLE ésta se puede seleccionar y hacer clic en "Asignar"

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: Then click Done

composition.layer: A continuación, haga clic en Hecho

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: For the integrated BLE module, 15 Seconds just after the teaching is done on the LOP the BLE module is triggered into commissioning mode. Select it.

composition.layer: En el caso del módulo BLE integrado, 15 segundos después de que se lleve a cabo el Teach-in en la LOP, el módulo BLE pasa al modo de puesta en marcha. Selecciónelo.

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: Activation of Fl X 500/600 LOP BLE Beacon to Commissioning mode.

composition.layer: Activación de la baliza LOP BLE FI X 500/600 al modo de Puesta en marcha.

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: To configure the BLE, please bring the LOP into teaching mode, as per chapter 4 of this eLearning,

composition.layer: Para configurar la BLE, ponga la LOP en modo Teach-in, de acuerdo con el capítulo 4 de esta formación en línea.

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: Then go ahead with "Continue"

composition.layer: Luego siga adelante con “Continuar”

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: Check Equipment information on the app

composition.layer: Consulte la información del equipo en la app

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: Then Click "Confirm"

composition.layer: A continuación, haga clic en "Confirmar"

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: Enter here the Equipment number of this elevator Manually or scan it.

composition.layer: Introduzca aquí el número de equipo del ascensor manualmente o escanéelo.

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: Click here on ElevateMe Commissioning 2

composition.layer: Haga clic en Puesta en marcha de ElevateMe

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: Click here on ElevateMe Commissioning

composition.layer: Haga clic en Puesta en marcha de ElevateMe

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: Click on procedures

composition.layer: Haga clic en procedimientos

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: On the Overview screen

composition.layer: En la pantalla de descripción general

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: iSpeci

composition.layer: iSpeci

composition.name: Activation of FI X 500 LOP BLE Beacon to Comm mode_2025-05

layer.name: Start the mobile app,

composition.layer: Inicie la aplicación móvil,

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: Commissioning done, finish with left upper arrow or close the iSpeci

composition.layer: Una vez finalizada la puesta en marcha, pulse la flecha superior izquierda para terminar o cierre iSpeci

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: To proceed click on "Finish"

composition.layer: Para continuar, haga clic en “Finalizar”

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: Once the changes are applied, iSpeci indicates that as successful.

composition.layer: Una vez aplicados los cambios, iSpeci indica que se han realizado correctamente.

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: Please Check and change all the parameters according to your needs and then click on "Configure".

composition.layer: Compruebe y modifique todos los parámetros de acuerdo con sus necesidades y, a continuación, haga clic en “Configurar”.

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: Hence these steps can be used as verification to check if the communication towards the display is working proper.

composition.layer: Por lo tanto, estos pasos se pueden utilizar como verificación para comprobar si la comunicación con la pantalla funciona correctamente.

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: These steps are performed directly through the network towards the device.

composition.layer: Estos pasos se realizan directamente, a través de la red, en el dispositivo.

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: Link screen is successful, Click on Serial number to configure. 2

composition.layer: La vinculación de pantalla se ha realizado correctamente. Haga clic en Número de serie para configurar.

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: Link screen is successful, Click on Serial number to configure.

composition.layer: La vinculación de pantalla se ha realizado correctamente. Haga clic en Número de serie para configurar.

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: To restart the display disconnect the power plug behind the COP.

composition.layer: Para reiniciar la pantalla, desenchufe el conector de alimentación situado detrás de la COP.

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: The QR code is only shown 1 hour after start. If QR code is not showing on a unconfigured device, restart the screen, then Scan the QR code.

composition.layer: El código QR solo se muestra durante 1 hora tras el inicio. Si el código QR no se muestra en un dispositivo no configurado, reinicie la pantalla y luego escanee el código QR.

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: Scan the QR code which is shown on the COP screen.

composition.layer: Escanee el código QR que aparece en la pantalla de la COP.

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: Click on "Link Screen Device".

composition.layer: Haga clic en ”Vincular dispositivo de pantalla”.

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: Then go ahead with "Continue"

composition.layer: Luego siga adelante con “Continuar”

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: Check on this screen if equipment number, address and location are correct.

composition.layer: En esta pantalla, compruebe si el número de equipo, la dirección y la ubicación son correctos.

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: Then Click "Confirm"

composition.layer: A continuación, haga clic en "Confirmar"

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: In Screen Configuration enter the Equipment number of this elevator Manually or scan it.

composition.layer: En Configuración de la pantalla, introduzca manualmente el número de equipo de este ascensor o escanéelo.

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: In Procedures Click on Screen Configuration 2

composition.layer: En Procedimientos, haga clic en Configuración de pantalla

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: In Procedures Click on Screen Configuration

composition.layer: En Procedimientos, haga clic en Configuración de pantalla

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: Click on procedures

composition.layer: Haga clic en procedimientos

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: On the Overview screen

composition.layer: En la pantalla de descripción general

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: iSpeci

composition.layer: iSpeci

composition.name: Commissioning of FI X 500 COP CMS display_2025-05

layer.name: Start the mobile app,

composition.layer: Inicie la aplicación móvil,

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: The configuration is Completed.

composition.layer: La configuración se ha completado.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: This can take up to 5 minutes.

composition.layer: Esto puede tardar hasta 5 minutos.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: The numbers are written onto the ETMA.

composition.layer: Los números se escriben en el ETMA.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: In case the alarm calls should go directly to the customer, adapt them, else proceed.

composition.layer: En caso de que las llamadas de alarma deban ir directamente al cliente, adáptelas, en caso contrario, continúe.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: The default numbers are loaded.

composition.layer: Se cargan los números predeterminados.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Make sure the Module Number matches to the Lift ID

composition.layer: Asegúrese de que el Número de módulo coincida con el ID del ascensor

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Select TeleAlarm El.

composition.layer: Seleccione TeleAlarm El.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Make sure the TA Modem Type and the Equipment Number are correct confirm that the TA for above Equipment is connected. 2

composition.layer: Asegúrese de que el tipo de módem TA y el número de equipo sean correctos. Confirme que el TA del equipo mencionado anteriormente esté conectado.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Make sure the TA Modem Type and the Equipment Number are correct confirm that the TA for above Equipment is connected.

composition.layer: Asegúrese de que el tipo de módem TA y el número de equipo sean correctos. Confirme que el TA del equipo mencionado anteriormente esté conectado.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Click on the lower right arrow and proceed.

composition.layer: Haga clic en la flecha inferior derecha y continúe.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: In case of an ETMA installed, ADD TELEALARM and Proceed.

composition.layer: En caso de tener un ETMA instalado, active AÑADIR TELEALARMA y continúe.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: 1st step CUBE Configuration is Done.

composition.layer: Primer paso, configuración de CUBE, realizado.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Please wait for configuration to get completed

composition.layer: Espere a que se complete la configuración

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Enable the Display devices in order to enable the display function within the Cube.

composition.layer: Habilite los dispositivos de visualización para activar la función de visualización dentro de Cube.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: ETM Detect Modem Success is expected, if failed, check the connection to the ETMA. 2

composition.layer: Se espera que el ETM detecte éxito en el módem, si falla, verifique la conexión al ETMA.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: In Commands ETM Detect mode "OK"

composition.layer: En el modo de detección ETM de comandos (Commands ETM Detect), seleccione “OK”

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: In the Main Menu go to Commands.

composition.layer: En el menú principal, vaya a Commands (Comandos).

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Log in on the SMLCD. 2

composition.layer: Inicie sesión en el SMLCD.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Modem detection for ETMA.

composition.layer: Detección de módem para ETMA.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Once the elevator has been configured, incase ETMA is installed select it under TA Modem Type and continue with the next steps.

composition.layer: Una vez configurado el ascensor, y en caso de que esté instalado ETMA, selecciónelo en Tipo de módem TA y continúe con los siguientes pasos.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Wait Until the elevator has been Configured.

composition.layer: Espere hasta que el ascensor haya sido configurado.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Enter the received, CUBE mobile number via SMS.

composition.layer: Introduzca el número de móvil CUBE recibido vía SMS.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Send SMS and enter SIM phone number.

composition.layer: Envíe un SMS e introduzca el número de teléfono SIM.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Please Select CUBE

composition.layer: Seleccione CUBE

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Wait Until the CUBE preparation gets done.

composition.layer: Espere hasta que se complete la preparación del CUBE.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: G W-xx CUBE serial number. 2

composition.layer: G W-xx CUBE número de serie.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: In Secure Comm go to Approve. 3

composition.layer: En Secure Comm (Comunicación segura) vaya a Approve (Aprobar).

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: In Commands go to Secure Comm

composition.layer: En Commands (Comandos) vaya a Secure Comm (Comunicación segura)

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: In the Main Menu go to Commands. 2

composition.layer: En el menú principal, vaya a Commands (Comandos).

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Log in on the SMLCD.

composition.layer: Inicie sesión en el SMLCD.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Approve secure communication

composition.layer: Apruebe la comunicación segura

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Wait until the Cube preparation gets done.

composition.layer: Espere hasta que se complete la preparación del CUBE.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Select Ethernet and the correct Group / Lift ID and go to the next steps.

composition.layer: Seleccione Ethernet, el ID de grupo/ascensor correcto y vaya a los siguientes pasos.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Select Controller Type, (SC1/SCX)

composition.layer: Seleccione el tipo de maniobra, (SC1/SCX)

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: To which Controller your Cube is connected.

composition.layer: A qué maniobra está conectado su CUBE.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Select Elevator and go to the next step.

composition.layer: Seleccione Ascensor y vaya al siguiente paso.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: For the installation type you are setting up

composition.layer: Para el tipo de instalación que está configurando

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Click on "Guided Mode"

composition.layer: Haga clic en “Modo guiado”

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Please select the cube you want to commission.

composition.layer: Seleccione el CUBE que desea poner en marcha.

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: If multiple cubes are found

composition.layer: Si se detectan varios CUBE

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Click on "Connect"

composition.layer: Haga clic en "Conectar"

composition.name: Steps in IoEE App Setup_2025-06

layer.name: Enter the equipment number, check the address

composition.layer: Introduzca el número de equipo, verifique la dirección
